info.title: SaltyNX-Tool
info.author: masagrator
info.details: To manage functions of this SaltyNX fork min. 0.2.0a\n\nTo use only in Applet mode.

changelog:
1.1.1
Added compatibility for Atmosphere 1.10.0+

1.1

Changed interface from console to Borealis framework.
Added icon
With Borealis it should be easier to understand notifications and other things.

1.0.4

Double validate SaltyNX to solve false positives issue.

1.0.3

Add option to disable log writing by SaltyNX >=0.2.0a

1.0.2

Now SaltyNX-Tool checks if it's in Applet Mode.

1.0.1

Deleted disabling cheats in Atmosphere, it's obsolete from SaltyNX 0.1.2a.
